Name: shouldFailWhenTheSsoServiceCouldNotBeProvisioned()
Description: Should fail when the SSO capability provisioning failed

Name: shouldSupportIngressPathsAtTheRootContext()
Description: Should support ingressPaths at the root context

Name: shouldPointComponentManagerToGlobalRepositoryNamespaces()
Description: Should point ComponentManager to the globally configured Component Repository Namespaces

Name: shouldDeployEntandoEapImageWithDefaultValues()
Description: Should deploy the Entando EAP image with all the default values in a Red Hat compliant environment

Name: shouldDeployImagesInAnnotations()
Description: Should deploy the images specified in the annotations for a given version of Entando

Name: shouldLogTimeoutException()
Description: Should log a timeout exception if the entire deployment did not complete on time

Name: shouldFailWhenTheDatabaseCouldNotBeProvisioned()
Description: Should fail when the database capability provisioning failed

Name: shouldLeaveEarlierExceptionInTactButStillLogIt()
Description: Should log an exception message occurring during the execution of the DeploymentProcessor and leave it attached to the EntandoApp.status
